name: F-F-F-Freeze!
description:
Find the cave to survive the cold!

In this top-down game, your health is declining and so is your core temperature; hunger adds to the mix, so make the best use of your time.  Items can be found along the way to improve health, temperature and satisfy hunger... for a short time.  As you search the environment for the cave entrance, be on the lookout for campfires as these greatly improve your temperature and add a little health; but they don't last when you leave the area.
